address: 321 N Clark St, Suite 1350, Chicago, IL 60654
valueProp: Latherow & Duignan is a law firm in Chicago, Illinois that specializes in personal injury cases. With almost four decades of combined experience, the firm's attorneys have a proven track record of securing multi-million dollar verdicts and settlements for their clients. They are committed to providing exceptional value to their clients through their knowledge of the law and practical, cost-effective solutions. The firm is dedicated to achieving justice for their clients and making a positive impact in the community.
